member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.MicrosoftAccount.MicrosoftAccountAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a pinned certificate validator to use to validate the endpoints used in back channel communications belong to Microsoft Account.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.summary: The application client secret assigned by the Microsoft authentication service.

member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in milliseconds for back channel communications with Microsoft.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.MicrosoftAccount.MicrosoftAccountAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to communicate with Microsoft. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value can be downcast to a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.MicrosoftAccount.MicrosoftAccountAuthenticationOptions.Scope
member.summary: A list of permissions to request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.MicrosoftAccount.MicrosoftAccountAuthenticationOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: The request path within the application's base path where the user-agent will be returned. The middleware will process this request when it arrives. Default value is "/signin-microsoft".
